subject: I am sure this mail would be
body:
I am sure this mail would be coming to you as a surprise since we have never met before and you would also be asking why I have decided to choose you.
I am Mrs. Mary Johnson,78years,an aging widow suffering from cancer, I am on admission at a hospital.I would like to willfully entrust the rest of my monetary assets to you, Kindly reply back with your full Name, cellphone, address, to enable me to send you a letter of authorization to contact my bank first inland bank nigeria plc so that they can transfer my funds to your account for the purpose of helping the poor as indicated on my WILL.
Reply me through my private email address: 
maryjohnson1bt@gmail.com
 
Kindly reply back immediately for further details?
Yours Faithfully.
Mrs.Mary Johnson.

subject: Re:   I am sure this mail would be
body:
Hello Johnson,

I'm sorry to hear about your situation. It's very kind of you to think about helping others even in such difficult times. I would love to know more about your plans and how I can be of help.

Could you please share more details about the process? How did you come across my contact information? And what exactly would my role be in this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Re: Waiting for your information now.
body:
Greetings in the name of the "Almighty God" Amen.

I am on admission at the intensive care unit of a London hospital,located
at Fulham road in west London United Kingdom.

Once again let me remind you for the avoidance of doubt, that the role i
want you to play in this project is self explanatory. I want you to
 execute my last(WILL and TESTAMENT) to the best of your ability on my
behalf as carefully streamlined in my first letter to you which you just
responded to. You will receive the $10,000,000.00 via your bank account
through my bankers and use the proceeds to better the lot of the less
fortunate around the globe in any way you may deem convenient for you. I
believe that my first letter to you was self explanatory enough. Note that
in answer to your question, yes you are the only sole heir apparent to the
fund and that is authoritative and my choosing you for this task is purely
by divine configuration and not by accident. I see you more as my brother
and not as (a total stranger).

Meanwhile, we have to start by you sending the following information to me
without delays, to enable me prepare letter of Authorization on your behalf
and send it to you and also copy the bank to enable the board and
management of First Inland Bank Nigeria Plc contact you as the new
Beneficiary of my fund and consequently begin the official process of
transferring the funds to your nominated bank account immediately.

Kindly send the information in this order:

(1) Your full names :=============

(2) personal contact/mailing address:==========

(3) Home or Office phone#:============Cellphone#:===

Be informed that the transfer process of the fund will adequately meet
international standards and layed down ethics to put all parties on a sound
footing without creating panic or skirmishes of any kind.

Lastly, i would like to remind you to be conscious of the intrinsic time
value of this project, hence the urgent need to expedite action in getting
started without undue delays.

Remember that such a bold step of commencing promptly will help in seeing
to the speedy conclusion of this project.

Have a nice day and may God bless you richly.

Yours Sincerely

Mrs. Mary Johnson.
   (LONDON UK).

subject: Re: Waiting for your information now.
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply touched by your trust in me and your noble intentions to help the less fortunate. It's indeed a divine connection that we've been brought together for such a purpose.

However, I must admit that I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions. Could you please explain more about how this process works? What does it mean to be the sole heir apparent to the fund? And what kind of responsibilities will I have?

Also, you mentioned something about a letter of on my behalf. Could you clarify what this letter is and its purpose?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon and learning more about how we can work together to make a positive impact on the world.

Best wishes,
Samuel

subject: Re: Waiting for your information now.
body:
Hello Mrs. Mary Johnson,

I hope this message finds you well. I am deeply touched by your trust in me and your noble intentions to help the less fortunate. It's indeed a divine connection that we've been brought together for such a purpose.

However, I would like to understand more about this project before proceeding further. Could you please provide more details about how the funds will be used? What kind of projects or charities do you have in mind? 

Also, could you kindly explain the process of transferring the funds? I'm not very familiar with these procedures and would appreciate if you could guide me through it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Samuel
